= Introduction =

= Format basics =

 * option 1 : use the JSon format to encode the traces

 * option 2 : use s-expressions

 * option 3 : use XML

= High-level traces =

== Spawn a new thread ==

{{{
{  "agentId" : <id> , 
   "clock" : <val> ,
   "trace" = { "type" : "Spawn",
                      "threadName" : <name>,
                      "threadId" : <tid>,
                    }
} 
}}}

Using s-expressions :

{{{
(trace 
   (agentId <id>)
   (clock <val>)
   (msg (type spawn)
             (threadName <name>)
             (threadId <tid>)))))        
}}}

Using infix s-expressions :

{{{
trace {
  agentId = <id>,
  clock = <val>,
  msg {
     type = spawn,
     threadName = <name>,
     threadId = <tid>
  }
}
}}}
